author: Carla Marinucci
title: Schwarzenegger: 'Shortsighted' for California to defund pandemic stockpile he built
description: As public servants, “our ultimate responsibility is not just to make a budget balance, but to save lives,’’ Schwarzenegger said.
content:
Former CA governor Arnold Schwarzenegger delivers a cargo of 50,000 N-95 masks in Los Angeles | Daniel Ketchell
OAKLAND Former Gov. Arnold Schwarzenegger told POLITICO on Tuesday it was "shortsighted" for California leaders to abandon a $200 million emergenc… [+3944 chars]
